item.title: Introspection and new hobby project
item.description: Introspection This is about re-assessing the problem solving approach. As we progress in our careers, we get efficient in finding solutions to daily problems.

item.title: Nth attempt at blog
item.description: Much to the theme of quintessential programmer’s kit, a blog is a must have (I kid, I kid!) I have attempted blogging multiple times.

item.title: About me
item.description: I currently work as software architect in a software-first robotics company At the same time, it’s futile to define myself with a title.
